resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
Place two pins by clicking on the screen

SoleSearch is an application designed to help forensic investigators quickly identify shoe prints left by culprits at a crime scene. Through the use of Android’s augmented reality capabilities and Microsoft Azure’s cloud custom vision artificial intelligent services, SoleSearch attempts to incorporate technology into this domain in order to improve efficiency and alleviate the stressfulness of investigative work.
